Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SyCPA 2 (Synthetic AMPs20; XXD4; lactam; XXJ; UCSB1a)
Sequence Information.Source: bioinformatic predicted bacterial nonribosomal gene cluster,Burkholderia gladioliBSR3, chr 2, bacteria-derived, natural derivatives
Sequence Information.Target Organism: active against B-subtilis 168 1A1 (MIC>64 ug/ml), E. faecium Com15 (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. aureus USA300 (MIC 8 ug/ml), E-coli DH5alpha (MIC>64 ug/ml), K-pneumoniae ATCC 10031 (MIC>64 ug/ml), A-baumannii ATCC 17978 (MIC>64 ug/ml), P-aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC>64 ug/ml), E-cloacae ATCC 14037 (MIC>64 ug/ml), M-tuberculosis H37RV (MIC>12.5 ug/ml).

Literature.Author: Chu J, Koirala B, Forelli N, Vila-Farres X, Ternei MA, Ali T, Colosimo DA, Brady SF. 2020
Literature.Title: Synthetic-Bioinformatic Natural Product Antibiotics with Diverse Modes of Action.

Sequence Information.Comments: the peptide was predicted but made in a different way. Warning: the first residue is 2,3-diaminopropionic acid, an analog of K. residues K1, p2, Q3, V5 are all D-amino acids (XXD4).
